entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
